data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Roxo, Fabio F., Silva, Gabriel S. C., Ochoa, Luz E., Oliveira, Claudio (2015): Description of a new genus and three new species of Otothyrinae (Siluriformes, Loricariidae). ZooKeys 534: 103-134, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.534.6169, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.534.6169
